sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUB_MER_ID ,REG_CAP ,SETT_BANK_CODE ,SETT_BANK_NAME ,CHANNEL ,SIGN_DATE ,SIGN_PERSON ,PROVINCE ,CITY ,SETT_BANK_PRO ,SETT_BANK_CITY ,SETT_SUPER_BANK_CODE ,SETT_SUPER_BANK_NAME FROM SUB_MER_INFO_EXTEND WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_INFO_EXTEND.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(REG_CAP) Like '%'||(#reg_cap:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL) Like '%'||(#channel:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_DATE) Like '%'||(#sign_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_PERSON) Like '%'||(#sign_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROVINCE) Like '%'||(#province:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CITY) Like '%'||(#city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_PRO) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_pro:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_CITY) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_SUPER_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#sett_super_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_SUPER_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_super_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_INFO_EXTEND WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_INFO_EXTEND.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(REG_CAP) Like '%'||(#reg_cap:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CHANNEL) Like '%'||(#channel:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_DATE) Like '%'||(#sign_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_PERSON) Like '%'||(#sign_person:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROVINCE) Like '%'||(#province:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CITY) Like '%'||(#city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_PRO) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_pro:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_BANK_CITY) Like '%'||(#sett_bank_city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_SUPER_BANK_CODE) Like '%'||(#sett_super_bank_code:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_SUPER_BANK_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_super_bank_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
